greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of set partitions of [n] having exactly k triples (t,t+1,t+2) such that t+i is in block b+i for some b; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=max(0,n-2), read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..100, flattened
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t, m) option remember; expand(`if`(n=0, 1, add((v->
T:= n-> (p-> seq(coeff(p, x, i), i=0..degree(p)))(b(n, 1, false, 0)):
mathematica: b[n_, i_, t_, m_] := b[n, i, t, m] = Expand[If[n==0, 1, Sum[Function[v, If[t && v, x, 1]*b[n-1, j, v, Max[m, j]]][j==i+1], {j, 1, m+1}]]]; T[n_] := Function[p, Table[Coefficient[p, x, i], {i, 0, Exponent[p, x]}]][b[n, 1, False, 0]]; Table[T[n], {n, 0, 14}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 05 2017, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 01 2016
